thread.title: LIVE: Donald Trump's inauguration as US President - Khaleej Times
thread.title_full: LIVE: Donald Trump's inauguration as US President - Khaleej Times

author: Web Team
title: LIVE: Donald Trump's inauguration as US President - Khaleej Times
text: - The White House (@WhiteHouse) January 20, 2017 Melania Trump channels Jackie-O in Ralph Lauren - Khaleej Times (@khaleejtimes) January 20, 2017 Barack Obama leaves Oval Office for last time - Khaleej Times (@khaleejtimes) January 20, 2017 6:45 PM Trump meets with outgoing president Barack Obama at the White House before heading to the Capitol for his swearing-in ceremony. Full story here LIVE BLOG: Trump meets with Obama at the White House https://t.co/D9wNd5ggd2 #KnowYourKT pic.twitter.com/dh8YhMXCnM - Khaleej Times (@khaleejtimes) January 20, 2017 6:15 PM Dan Scavino Jr, Trump's Director of Social Media, tweeted out a photo of the First Family visiting a church to mark the beginning of their inauguration day activities. Read the full story here 'History in the making....' - Dan Scavino Jr. (@DanScavino) January 20, 2017 6:09 PM Outgoing President Barack Obama, using the official Twitter account of the President (@POTUS) made a series of tweets - the last ones as Trump is poised to take the oath of office. It's been the honor of my life to serve you. You made me a better leader and a better man. - President Obama (@POTUS) January 20, 2017 I won't stop; I'll be right there with you as a citizen, inspired by your voices of truth and justice, good humor, and love. - President Obama (@POTUS) January 20, 2017 As we look forward, I want our first steps to reflect what matters most to you. Share your thoughts with me at https://t.co/fGUxlpLVue . - President Obama (@POTUS) January 20, 2017 I'm still asking you to believe - not in my ability to bring about change, but in yours. I believe in change because I believe in you. - President Obama (@POTUS) January 20, 2017 4:31 PM It all begins today! I will see you at 11:00 A.M. for the swearing-in. THE MOVEMENT CONTINUES - THE WORK BEGINS! - Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 20, 2017 Share
